name: Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic pasta dish made with eggs, bacon, and cheese.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
In a separate pan, fry the bacon until crispy. Remove from pan and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Add the cooked pasta to the bacon pan and toss to coat in the bacon fat.
Remove from heat and pour the egg mixture over the pasta, stirring quickly to prevent it from scrambling.
Serve immediately, topped with extra Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
